title: Tesla Cybertruck lands on Mars and picks up the Curiosity rover on its 6' bed
tuit: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

title: SpaceX is a private American aerospace manufacturer
tuit: SpaceX is a private American aerospace manufacturer founded by Elon Musk in 2002 with the goal of reducing the cost of space exploration and eventually colonizing Mars. The company's reusable rockets have revolutionized the space industry by significantly reducing launch costs and making space exploration more accessible to both public and private entities

title: Tesla is a leading electric vehicle and clean energy company founded by Elon Musk in 2003
tuit: Tesla is a leading electric vehicle and clean energy company founded by Elon Musk in 2003. The company's mission is to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy by producing electric cars, solar panels, and energy storage systems
